statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.30} per pound with some Queen City coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.70} per pound to create \displaystyle{30} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.45} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
